QuestData.Title: The Family Jewels
QuestData.Description:
Darn pirates stole my jewels... err, I mean my sister's... uh, mom's jewelry. Yeah, that's the story!
Point is, they stole it, and it's all out there strewn around in the mud, and treasure chests. Maybe on a few of the robots and murlocs.
My mom's not greedy, she just wants a few of the necklaces with gold and lots of diamonds. I'd pay ya for those.
